about_the_game:
Magnetic: Cage Closed is a first person puzzle game where the player manipulates magnetic forces to accomplish their goals. In this free DLC, the focus lies on one thing and one thing alone: Testing the limits of the Magnet Gun and the skill-level of the player. We have unleashed all the evil creative geniuses at the studio to bring you the most difficult maps you could wish for. Pull yourself ever upwards through the hazardous Twister, wrack your brain for a solution in Sequence or, if you really like to torture yourself, face of against a deadly series of traps in The Gauntlet.

  • Five new and unique challenge maps that test your skills to the limit.
detailed_description:
Magnetic: Cage Closed is a first person puzzle game where the player manipulates magnetic forces to accomplish their goals. In this free DLC, the focus lies on one thing and one thing alone: Testing the limits of the Magnet Gun and the skill-level of the player. Pull yourself ever upwards through the hazardous Twister, wrack your brain for a solution in Sequence or, if you really like to torture yourself, face of against a deadly series of traps in The Gauntlet.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-750 or 3.2 GHz AMD Phenom™ II X4 955
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD5850 (1 GB vram)
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse with scroll wheel suggested for a smoother gameplay experience. Supports Xbox 360 compatible controllers

short_description: Get ready for a brand new set of challenges that really tests the limits of both players and the game tools. In this DLC-pack you get the best of both worlds: puzzle-focused brain teasers and neck-breaking trick-jumping action. If you really love a challenge, then this pack is for you.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
